website_summaries.verdict: Cuddly bat-shaped toy that allows parents to talk to kids via voice chat.
pros: Messages sent to the plushie are saved and can be replayed
Using the toy is easy even for young children and the accompanying app is intuitive
cons: Device sometimes has trouble reconnecting to Wi-Fi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for military kids facing a deployment!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is currently deployed overseas. Before we left, I saw this product featured on Shark Tank and immediately ordered it for my 3-year-old daughter. It works exactly as we had hoped! It really makes such a difference that she can leave Daddy a message as soon as she thinks of something she wants to tell him vs. waiting until our next call. And she lights up when she hears Daddy's voice. It was slightly difficult to set up, but it's simple to use day-to-day. Even my 20-month-old can leave Daddy messages. What an amazing product! It makes Daddy seem closer to home, which is everything right now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Betcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It's a great way to keep in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's a great way to keep in touch with my 8 year old granddaughter. She gets to hear my voice when we message and doesn't need a phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Tarmy

customer_reviews.title: Once you can figure it out for yourself and family to use it is a cute toy even the kids can enjoy
customer_reviews.text: directions are not exactly clear on how to use it so it takes some time to get use to. Once you can figure it out for yourself and family to use it is a cute toy even the kids can enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Poor egonomics, delayed messages and frustration all around
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get my daughter a toy that would let her keep in touch with her family and friends without screen time. Unfortunately, the buttons didn't quite line up well, so she would have to unzip the pouch and take out the electronic device to use it. On top of the ergonomic issues, setup was a bit of a pain and she and I would both find message notifications would often be delayed. The most use it's gotten was when my two year old got a hold of it and and a market and went to town. A bit of an expense investment for those few minutes of fun. All and all, a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: wendy816

customer_reviews.title: So easy and so wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they made an update to rectify all the issues other reviewers had - but this was SO simple to set up - done in minutes! Easy to use- my little guy was using it within 15 minutes and we were able to talk while I was half a word away. This actually meant the world to me. Thank you for creating this!
